metadata.title: CVE-2023-28686 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Dino before 0.2.3, 0.3.x before 0.3.2, and 0.4.x before 0.4.2 allowsattackers to modify the personal bookmark store via a crafted message. Theattacker can change the display of group chats or force a victim to join agroup chat; the victim may then be tricked into disclosing sensitiveinformation.

criterions.comment: dino-im package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
